author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the material budget scipt to enable obtaining material budget plots for HFNose

#### PR validation:

Obtained the plots with the 2026D94 scenario before and after HFNose 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx349 Modify the material budget scipt to enable obtaining material budget plots for HFNose
